renderingProperty.name: Less intrusive shops+food
renderingProperty.description: Suppress display of most shops and food (+drink) POIs until zoom level 19

renderingProperty.name: Less intr banks+health+post
renderingProperty.description: Suppress display of most banks, atm, health and post amenities (except hospitals) until zoom level 19

renderingProperty.name: Less details
renderingProperty.description: Suppress display of some details on low and middle zoom levels
